original_title: André Le Notre: O Jardineiro do Rei Luis XIV
overview: André Le Notre is certainly the most famous French gardener. He was also a designer, architect, engineer, landscaper and urban planner. He worked for Louis XIV from 1645 to 1700 and designed the gardens of Versailles, Vaux le Vicomte, Chantilly and Fontainebleau, as well as the Tuileries in Paris.
title: André Le Notre: O Jardineiro do Rei Luis XIV
